item.title: About me
item.description: My name is Pritish Patil. my history I am a graduate student with Ofer Yizhar and Misha Tsodyks at the Weizmann Institute of Science. I am interested in understanding how the brain processes information and how it gives rise to behavior. I am particularly interested in the role of subcellular compartments in shaping neuronal computation. I am also interested in the role of neuromodulators in shaping the dynamics of neural circuits.
